aboutBlock.title: DevFest Pisa is coming back in 2019!

featuredSessions.description: GDG Pisa is proud to announce that DevFest Pisa 0.1 is now stable! DevFest Pisa will be a one-day conference all about Android, Web, Cloud and Google technologies in the hearth of Tuscany.
featuredSessions.label: Read the full announcement

howItWas.description: After the success of DevFest Pisa 0.1 in March 2018, the GDG Pisa is happy to announce another awesome conference for 2019!
howItWas.label: See how it was in 2018

team.description:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

[Google Developers Group (GDG) Pisa](https://gdgpisa.it/) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion.

Our goal is to organize space to connect the best industry experts with Ukrainian audience to boost development of IT.

notifications.enabled: We will miss you but you can unsubscribe anytime
